[ti:Heat Waves (Shakur Ahmad Remix)]
[ar:Glass Animals]
[al:Dreamland (+ Bonus Levels) (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Heat Waves (Shakur Ahmad Remix) - Glass Animals
[00:00.23]Lyrics by：Dave Bayley
[00:00.47]Composed by：Dave Bayley
[00:00.71]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:02.81]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[00:05.53]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:07.66]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a
[00:10.18]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:12.27]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a mirror
[00:14.97]Road shimmer wigglin' the vision
[00:17.00]Heat heat waves I'm swimmin' in a
[00:19.78]Usually I put somethin' on TV
[00:22.26]So we never think about you and me
[00:24.59]But today I see our reflections clearly
[00:27.25]In Hollywood layin' on the screen
[00:29.30]You just need a better life than this
[00:31.76]You need somethin' I can never give
[00:34.07]Fake water all across the road
[00:36.51]It's gone now the night has come but
[00:39.03]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:41.42]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:43.96]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:46.37]Can't make you happier now
[00:48.75]Sometimes all I think about is you
[00:51.12]Late nights in the middle of June
[00:53.59]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[00:56.00]Can't make you happier now
[00:58.08]You can't fight it you can't breathe
[01:00.47]You say somethin' so lovin' but
[01:03.10]Now I gotta let you go
[01:05.49]You'll be better off in someone new
[01:08.07]I don't wanna be alone
[01:10.16]You know it hurts me too
[01:12.83]You look so broken when you cry
[01:15.31]One more and then I'll say goodbye
[01:17.69]Sometimes all I think about is you
[01:20.04]Late nights in the middle of June
[01:22.50]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:24.87]Can't make you happier now
[01:27.11]Sometimes all I think about is you
[01:29.70]Late nights in the middle of June
[01:32.11]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:34.41]Can't make you happier now

[01:42.41]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:44.77]Can't make you happier now
[01:46.39]Sometimes all I think about is you
[01:49.71]Late nights in the middle of June
[01:51.99]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[01:54.31]Can't make you happier now
[01:56.10]I just wonder what you're dreamin' of
[01:58.42]When you sleep and smile so comfortable
[02:00.86]I just wish that I could give you that
[02:03.23]That look that's perfectly un-sad
[02:05.67]Sometimes all I think about is you
[02:07.95]Late nights in the middle of June
[02:10.51]Heat waves been fakin' me out
[02:12.85]Heat waves been fakin' me out

data.trans:
[ti:Heat Waves (Shakur Ahmad Remix)]
[ar:Glass Animals]
[al:Dreamland (+ Bonus Levels) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.23]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.71]道路上闪烁着微光眼前一片光明
[00:02.81]热浪来袭我在镜子里徜徉
[00:05.53]道路上闪烁着微光眼前一片光明
[00:07.66]热浪来袭我徜徉在
[00:10.18]道路上闪烁着微光眼前一片光明
[00:12.27]热浪来袭我在镜子里徜徉
[00:14.97]道路上闪烁着微光眼前一片光明
[00:17.00]热浪来袭我徜徉在
[00:19.78]通常我会在电视上播点什么
[00:22.26]我们从未想过你和我的事
[00:24.59]但今天我清楚地看到了我们的倒影
[00:27.25]在好莱坞躺在荧幕上
[00:29.30]你只需要更好的生活
[00:31.76]你需要的东西我永远给不了
[00:34.07]马路对面到处都是假水
[00:36.51]一切都已消失夜幕降临但是
[00:39.03]有时我心里想的全是你
[00:41.42]六月中旬的深夜
[00:43.96]热浪来袭我虚情假意
[00:46.37]现在我无法让你更快乐
[00:48.75]有时我心里想的全是你
[00:51.12]六月中旬的深夜
[00:53.59]热浪来袭我虚情假意
[00:56.00]现在我无法让你更快乐
[00:58.08]你无法抗拒你无法呼吸
[01:00.47]你说了一些甜言蜜语但是
[01:03.10]现在我必须让你走
[01:05.49]另寻新欢你会过得更好
[01:08.07]我不想独自一人
[01:10.16]你知道我也很难过
[01:12.83]你哭的时候看起来好伤心
[01:15.31]再喝一杯我就说再见
[01:17.69]有时我心里想的全是你
[01:20.04]六月中旬的深夜
[01:22.50]热浪来袭我虚情假意
[01:24.87]现在我无法让你更快乐
[01:27.11]有时我心里想的全是你

[01:34.41]现在我无法让你更快乐
[01:36.86]有时我心里想的全是你

[01:56.10]我只想知道你在梦想什么
[01:58.42]当你酣然入睡面带微笑惬意自在
[02:00.86]我只希望我能给你
[02:03.23]那种表情一点也不悲伤
[02:05.67]有时我心里想的全是你
